meanings.sent1: The inkless pen left no marks on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The printer ran out of ink, so the page remained inkless.
meanings.sent3: The detective's inkless pen couldn't reveal the invisible message.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt inkless, unable to come up with any creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The artist's canvas stayed inkless, waiting for a burst of color.

meanings.sent1: The inkless cartridge needed to be replaced before printing.
meanings.sent2: The student's inkless pen made it hard to take notes.
meanings.sent3: The inkless printer was as useful as a broken pencil.
meanings.sent4: His words felt inkless, lacking the depth he usually expressed.
meanings.sent5: The old manuscript appeared inkless, its words faded with time.
